main event: A bright, fast-moving object was observed in the sky over Pine Bluff, Arkansas on March 25, 1966.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a full moon and traveled due east at a speed comparable to a jet plane.
The object disappeared behind clouds and then reappeared, indicating it was very close to the ground.
The object made a small, flashing light that was more brilliant and steady compared to typical aircraft lights.
Two witnesses watched the object for around 10 minutes, noting it hovered and changed direction during the sighting.
The witness, an employee of the federal government, had previously reported seeing similar unidentified objects in 1952, 1953, and 1957.
